Uses of Package
handist.collections.dist

  • Packages that use handist.collections.dist 
    Package Description
    handist.collections.dist
    Contains the classes handling distributed collections, data relocation, and load balancing facilities.
    handist.collections.dist.util
    Package containing a few utility classes that help in some specific internal operations.
    handist.collections.glb
    Contains the routines of the Global Load Balancer for the Distributed Collection Library
    handist.collections.glb.lifeline
    Contains the general description of what a lifeline is and some implementations.
  • Classes in handist.collections.dist used by handist.collections.dist 
    Class and Description
    CachableArray
    A class for handling objects using the Master-Proxy mechanism.
    CollectiveMoveManager
    This class is used for relocating elements of distributed collections in a collective manner.
    DistBag
    A class for handling objects at multiple places.
    DistBag.DistBagGlobal
    Implementation of the GLOBAL handle for class DistBag
    DistBag.DistBagTeam
    Implementation of the TEAM handle for class DistBag
    DistCol
    A class for handling objects at multiple places.
    DistCol.DistColGlobal
    Global handle for the DistCol class.
    DistCol.DistColTeam
    TEAM handle for methods that can be called concurrently to other methods on all local handles of DistCol
    DistManager 
    DistMap
    A Map data structure spread over the multiple places.
    DistMap.DistMapGlobal 
    DistMap.DistMapTeam 
    DistMultiMap
    A Map data structure spread over the multiple places.
    DistributedCollection
    Interface representing the most basic characteristics of a distributed collection
    Distribution
    Represents the mapping of a key to a place for a distributed collection.
    GlobalOperations
    Interface that defines the "Global Operations" that distributed collections propose.
    KeyRelocatable
    Interface defining a number of methods allowing transfer of entries between the local containers of a distributed collection.
    LongDistribution 
    LongRangeDistribution 
    MoveManager
    MoveManager is an entity which handles the transfer or distributed collections entries from one distributed collection to another.
    RangedDistribution
    Interface representing the distribution of a type R onto multiple Places.
    RangeRelocatable
    Interface defining a number of methods allowing the transfer of data objects between the local containers of a distributed collection.
    SinglePlaceGroup
    SinglePlaceGroup is a place group consisting of a single place.
    TeamedPlaceGroup
    Represents a group of hosts and provides communication facilities between hosts.
    TeamOperations
    Interface which defines the "team" operations that distributed collections provide.
  • Classes in handist.collections.dist used by handist.collections.dist.util 
    Class and Description
    TeamedPlaceGroup
    Represents a group of hosts and provides communication facilities between hosts.
  • Classes in handist.collections.dist used by handist.collections.glb 
    Class and Description
    DistBag
    A class for handling objects at multiple places.
    DistCol
    A class for handling objects at multiple places.
    DistMap
    A Map data structure spread over the multiple places.
  • Classes in handist.collections.dist used by handist.collections.glb.lifeline 
    Class and Description
    TeamedPlaceGroup
    Represents a group of hosts and provides communication facilities between hosts.
